item.description:
Ladies Night @ MOM'South

July 7 (Thursday) Ladies Night at MOM'South .    We received an invitation to set up an information table to promote Women On Wheels®!  Katherine and Jeri have graciously offered to share our info with any interested women.  Please visit MOM'South and lend them your support. 

 MOM'South will be hosting their first ever Ladies Night on Thursday, July 7th from 6:00pm-9:00pm.  The invite goes out to all the gals that share our passion for motorcycles!  This event is at our FOXBORO location:
...108 Washington Street (Route 1) in Foxboro, MA. (508) 543-1734 
Their goal is to have a fun night with the ladies, so they'll have: information & demonstrations geared toward female riders, food, music, vendors, prizes & more!  If you're thinking about updating some of your riding gear ladies, this is your night! They're bringing in a trailer load full of helmets, jackets, pants, gloves, boots and more! Ladies who attend Ladies Night will be offered a 25% discount on their purchase of riding gear and apparel for that evening.
item.name: Ladies Night @ MOM'South
